name: MID Adjust
short_description:
Prepare reads for Pyrotagger or QIIME analysis

Pyrotagger only accepts sequencing reads that have MID sequences (a.k.a barcodes, tags), and all of them must have the same length. When you have no MIDs, or variable-length MIDs, MID Adjust appends new MIDs or extends existing ones to satisfy Pyrotagger requirements.

New features include the ability to generate fake quality scores and to parse and generate QIIME mapping files.
summary: Prepare reads with no MIDs or variable length MIDs for analysis
